content: MQS-IB Beam connector Galvanized pre-assembled beam connector with FM approval for seismic bracing of fire sprinkler pipes on steel structures ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Compatible with steel beams from 6 to 28 mm flange thickness FM-approved system for bracing of fire sprinkler installations Meets U.S.A. National Fire Protection Association (NFPA) requirements for seismic braces Shear-off bolt heads make installation and inspection quicker and easier Applications Seismic approved (FM) bracing of fire sprinkler pipes Steel beam attachment component for longitudinal and transversal brace assembly For use in combination with MQS-SP-L or MQS-SP-T channel connectors ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals: FM approved seismic sprinkler applications Diameter - D: 0.49 in Material composition: Connector: S275JR - DIN EN 10025, Bolt: Steel grade 8.8, Nut: Steel grade 8 Technical Data | Material composition | Connector: S275JR - DIN EN 10025, Bolt: Steel grade 8.8, Nut: Steel grade 8 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2149041 - Steel beam connector for seismic applications - Package Size 2 pc
